## Part 1


```{r}
input <- "987654321111111
811111111111119
234234234234278
818181911112111"

banks <- read_lines(input)
banks <- read_lines("input/03")
head(banks)
```


```{r}
combi_max_banks <- function(b) {
  str_split_1(b, pattern = "") |> 
  combn(2, simplify = FALSE) |> 
  map_int(\(x) paste(x, collapse = "") |> as.integer()) |> 
  max()
}

tic()
map_int(banks, combi_max_banks) |> 
  sum()
toc()
```


1.88 sec 17405


## Part 2

```{r}
combi_max_banks2 <- function(b) {
  str_split_1(b, pattern = "") |> 
  combn(12, simplify = FALSE) |> 
  map(\(x) paste(x, collapse = "")) |> 
  unlist() |> as.numeric() |> 
  max()
}

tic()
map(banks, combi_max_banks2) |> 
  as.numeric() |> 
  sum()
toc()

b = banks[1]
```
